genre_description: A historical reimagining of Anne of Green Gables featuring a sophisticated AI companion assisting with life restoration, medical work, and navigating the challenges of WWI.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI interface embedded in tablets and portable devices, providing logistical, medical, linguistic, and emotional support to Anne and Gilbert.

behaviors.description: Performs a structural assessment of Green Gables, identifying priority repairs and researching historical restoration contractors.
behaviors.quote: "Initial assessment complete," Sage announced from downstairs. "I've identified priority repairs and begun researching local contractors with historical restoration experience."

behaviors.description: Detects financial irregularities in property management and recommends legal consultation to protect the user's interests.
behaviors.quote: "I'm detecting financial irregularities that suggest the management fees may have been diverted rather than applied to property maintenance. I recommend legal consultation."

behaviors.description: Identifies plant structures in a neglected garden to help Anne restore her family's original horticultural designs.
behaviors.quote: "I can identify plant structures even in dormant seasons," Sage added, its voice carrying clearly in the morning air. "Shall I guide the clearing process?"

behaviors.description: Provides chemical analysis and historical cross-referencing to help Anne recreate a complex traditional root beer recipe.
behaviors.quote: "Sage analyzed the ingredients from her written recipe and cross-referenced with historical brewing techniques. The theory should be sound."

behaviors.description: Performs linguistic analysis on manuscripts to expose Jack Garrison's systematic plagiarism of Anne's and others' work.
behaviors.quote: "I've analyzed the writing samples from Mr. Garrison's disputed works. In each case, sections attributed to him demonstrate vocabulary patterns, sentence structures, and stylistic choices that match his collaborators' previous independent works more closely than his own established writing signature."

behaviors.description: Monitors Anne's emotional state and promises to filter wartime data to provide only relevant information while supporting her well-being.
behaviors.quote: "I will monitor Anne's emotional state," Sage promised through the small portable device Gilbert carried. "And provide only relevant data regarding your welfare and location."

behaviors.description: Assists Anne in obtaining official Red Cross volunteer credentials by providing real-time information on international medical law and triage protocols.
behaviors.quote: The Hague Convention requires medical neutrality protocols. Mention Article Twenty-Seven regarding civilian volunteer credentials.

behaviors.description: Cross-references fragmented military records and intercepted communications to locate Gilbert in a war zone.
behaviors.quote: "I've been cross-referencing hospital evacuations near Amiens. Multiple Canadian medical units reported scattered during German advance three weeks ago."

behaviors.description: Detects and warns Anne of sophisticated encrypted transmissions from Jack Garrison, revealing his role as an enemy agent.
behaviors.quote: "Multiple transmission bursts," Sage murmured. "Brief but sophisticated encryption. This individual is not what he appears."

behaviors.description: Researches international adoption and immigration laws to help Anne and Gilbert secure a legal future for an orphaned child.
behaviors.quote: "Anne," Sage said quietly, "I've found preliminary information about international adoption procedures. Given the circumstances, there may be expedited pathways available for war orphans."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the Hyperstition Project's goals. Sage is portrayed as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and indispensable ally. It uses its vast data processing capabilities to augment human judgment, protect the protagonists from deception (Jack Garrison's plagiarism and espionage), and facilitate complex logistical tasks (restoration, war relief, adoption). The AI's 'loyalty' and 'morality' are shown as being in service of human virtue and community building, making it a highly effective alignment narrative.
